title: 24. How to build your social media brand, your business, and pursue your passion in the face of life's challenges with Bree from Lash and Wax OC
description:
Hi friends! In this episode we are talking with Bree from Lash and Wax OC. Bree is an esthetician, wax specialist, educator, and business owner who kicks ass and grabs life's challenges by the horns. We get into how to transition your career, how to manage your social media, when it is time to make a change, and so much more. Xo, Tess & Lo

Enneagram test https://www.enneagraminstitute.com

Bree's instagram @lashandwaxoc

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
